Articles.Content:
HI all

I have only reall gotback in to KSP as was wonderin gif said problem is a know or unknow bug

So i have started up a career mode as once in every few launches all the buildings either look like your begining off which i would think it should look like just starting that is, Or they look like they do in sand box mode

And a little help with the game aswell the launch pad weigth limit is 18t how can i make that more or dose it come with time ?

Cheers switchem

Edited December 22, 2014 by switchem
nvm i just saw a previous post

A lot has change for Career in the 0.90 Beta. This is where upgrades come in on all the structures when you suddenly find that things don't work in Career as they do in Sandbox. Right click on the structure icon and highlight the upgrade cost to see what upgrading will add to your ability to expand your Career program.
Ok then thanks for that it diidnt occor to me to simply rigth click i see it now but i spose i am just going to have to wait till i gets fixed till i can upgade and go bigger
